location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 4459/45 'Activities handled by Mr Peter Loxley taken over by Mr CaVendish-Bentinck, Mr Caccia successor to CaVendish-Bentinck'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of telegrams announcing the transition of Victor Cavendish Bentham from the Foreign Office, where he acted as Assistant Under-Secretary of State, Chairman of the Joint Intelligence Committee of Chiefs of Staff, and Adviser to Directors of Plans, to HM Ambassador to Poland; and the appointment of Harold Caccia as his successor.
